explanations.text: Install **opam**, the version management / package manager of OCaml. If you don't trust me, check the [official webpage](https://opam.ocaml.org/doc/Install.html).

In all of these examples, you will need to replace the standard library of OCaml with the well-accepted replacements of Janestreet: Base, Core_kernel, and Core. To consult the documentation of any packages, refer to the [docs](https://docs.ocaml.pro/).
